wishala pramanayaka aramudal wiwidha kshethrawalata yomu karanawita ayawaya lekhanaya thulanaya karaganna puluwan da kiyana prashnaya.mama hithanawa me karuna pahadili wenawa aadayam pramanaya ha wiyadam pramanaya gananaya karanawita mewa pahadiliwa athulath kara thibenawa.aya waya lekhanaye hingaya jathika aadayamata anupathayak hatiyata salakanawita mokak da wenne. 2014 wada adu anupathayakata ayawaya hingaya meda adukaragannatath rajayata hakiwi thibenawa kiyana eka penwa denna puluwan.hondin kalpana kara balana kenakuta meda aya waya honda aarthika prathipaththiyak thula pihita rate sama kotasakatama sama pudgalayekutama balapana andamata idiripath kara thibenawa yayi kiyanna puluwan yayi da mahacharyawaraya kiya.rajya sewa wruththiya samithi sammelanaye sabhapathi dabliw.

paribhogikayin saha welendan  pawasanne pitikiri walata amatharawa sahal warga kihipayaka saha athyawashya bhanda kihipayakama hingayak pawathina bawayi.me athara samagam kihipayak samaga giwisum walata elambaimata  thamanta balapam ella wana bawa pawasamin paribhogika katayuthu pilibanda adhikariye widhayaka adhyaksha thushan gunawardhana siya dhurayen illa aswana bawa hiru had tok wisheshangaya samaga ekwemin pasugiyada prakasha kala.ee anuwa siya illa aswime lipiya ada bhara dun bawayi paribhogika katayuthu pilibanda adhikariye widhayaka adhyaksha thushan gunawardhana kiya sitiye.me athara, kiripiti, sahal, thiringu piti saha simenthi mila ihala yama sambandhayen me sathiyedi awasan thinduwakata elambaena bawa paribhogika aarakshana rajya amathya lasantha alagiyawanna ehidi kiya sitiya.
